localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Fundraising Hours is an effortless office hour event connecting early-stage founders fundraising remotely. The founders can get notified when the investors open their office hours. Powered by Remotehour.
blogPost.body: Fundraising Hours is an effortless office hour event connecting early-stage founders fundraising remotely. The founders can get notified when the investors open their office hours. Powered by Remotehour.
blogPost.title: Fundraising Hours - Remotely connecting founders with committed investors
blogPost.author: Shun Yamada

localize.description: 筹款时间是一项毫不费力的办公时间活动，将早期创始人远程筹款联系起来。当投资者开放办公时间时，创始人可以得到通知。由RemoteHour提供动力。
localize.tagline: 远程连接创始人与忠诚的投资者

localize.description: 籌款時間是一項毫不費力的辦公時間活動，將早期創始人遠程籌款聯繫起來。當投資者開放辦公時間時，創始人可以得到通知。由RemoteHour提供動力。
localize.tagline: 遠程連接創始人與忠誠的投資者

next.excerpt: Push a button and send user stories in your product spec to Jira. Fable will also keep the spec fresh with any changes made to the tickets on Jira. No more copy + pasting from Docs into Jira, no more stale spec!
next.title: Fable - Sync user stories and requirements between Docs and Jira

localize.description: 按下按钮，将产品规格中的用户故事发送到Jira上。Fable还将通过对Jira上的票据所做的任何更改来保持规格的新鲜感。不再需要从Docs复制+粘贴到Jira中，不再有陈旧的规格。
localize.tagline: 在Docs和Jira之间同步用户故事和需求。

localize.description: 按下按鈕，將產品規格中的用戶故事發送到Jira上。Fable還將通過對Jira上的票據所做的任何更改來保持規格的新鮮感。不再需要從Docs複製+粘貼到Jira中，不再有陳舊的規格。
localize.tagline: 在Docs和Jira之間同步用戶故事和需求。
